Description: This template contains the security groups required by our entire stack. We create them in a seperate nested template, so they can be referenced by all of the other nested templates.

EnvironmentName.Description: An environment name that will be prefixed to resource names

VPC.Description: Choose which VPC the security groups should be deployed to

Properties.GroupDescription: Access to the load balancer that sits in front of ECS

LoadBalancerSecurityGroup.Description: A reference to the security group for load balancers
